00021 //----------------------------------------------------------
00022 MVec2::MVec2()
00023 {
00024         _data = Align16( _array );
00025         _data[ 0 ] = 0.0f;
00026         _data[ 1 ] = 0.0f;
00027 }
00028 
00029 //----------------------------------------------------------
00030 MVec2::MVec2( float x, float y )
00031 {
00032         _data = Align16( _array );
00033         _data[ 0 ] = x;
00034         _data[ 1 ] = y;
00035 }
00036 
00037 //----------------------------------------------------------
00038 MVec2::MVec2( const MVec2& v )
00039 {
00040         _data = Align16( _array );
00041         _data[ 0 ] = v._data[ 0 ];
00042         _data[ 1 ] = v._data[ 1 ];
00043 }

00057 MVec2&
00058 MVec2::operator = ( const MVec2& v )
00059 {
00060         _data[ 0 ] = v._data[ 0 ];
00061         _data[ 1 ] = v._data[ 1 ];
00062         return *this;
00063 }

00065 //----------------------------------------------------------
00066 float&
00067 MVec2::operator ()( int i )
00068 {
00069         B_ASSERT( i < 2 );
00070         return _data[ i ];
00071 }
00072 
00073 //----------------------------------------------------------

00075 MVec2::operator ()( int i ) const
00076 {
00077         B_ASSERT( i < 2 );
00078         return _data[ i ];
00079 }

00081 //----------------------------------------------------------
00082 MVec2
00083 MVec2::operator * ( const MVec2& v ) const
00084 {
00085 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00086         MVec2 d;
00087         float *data1Ptr = _data;
00088         float *data2Ptr = v._data;
00089         float *output = d._data;
00090 
00092         __asm
00093         {
00094                 mov eax, data1Ptr;
00095                 mov ebx, data2Ptr;
00096                 mov edx, output;
00097                 movaps xmm0, [ eax ];
00098                 movaps xmm1, [ ebx ];
00099                 mulps xmm0, xmm1;
00100                 movaps [ edx ], xmm0;
00101         };
00102         return d;
00103 #else
00104         return MVec2( _data[ 0 ] * v._data[ 0 ], _data[ 1 ] * v._data[ 1 ] );
00105 #endif
00106 }

00136 MVec2
00137 MVec2::operator + ( const MVec2& v ) const
00138 {
00139 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00140         MVec2 d;
00141         float *data1Ptr = _data;
00142         float *data2Ptr = v._data;
00143         float *output = d._data;
00144 
00146         __asm
00147         {
00148                 mov eax, data1Ptr;
00149                 mov ebx, data2Ptr;
00150                 mov edx, output;
00151                 movaps xmm0, [ eax ];
00152                 movaps xmm1, [ ebx ];
00153                 addps xmm0, xmm1;
00154                 movaps [ edx ], xmm0;
00155         };
00156         return d;
00157 #else
00158         return MVec2( _data[ 0 ] + v._data[ 0 ], _data[ 1 ] + v._data[ 1 ] );
00159 #endif

00214 //----------------------------------------------------------
00215 MVec2&
00216 MVec2::operator *= ( float scale )
00217 {
00218 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00219         float *data1Ptr = _data;
00220 
00222         __asm
00223         {
00224                 mov ebx, data1Ptr;
00225                 movd xmm0, scale;
00226                 shufps xmm0, xmm0, 0x00;
00227                 movaps xmm1, [ ebx ];
00228                 mulps xmm0, xmm1;
00229                 movaps [ ebx ], xmm0;
00230         };
00231 #else
00232         _data[ 0 ] *= scale;
00233         _data[ 1 ] *= scale;
00234 #endif
00235         return *this;
00236 }

00313 //----------------------------------------------------------
00314 MVec2
00315 operator * ( float scale, const MVec2& v )
00316 {
00317 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00318         MVec2 d;
00319         float *data2Ptr = v._data;
00320         float *output = d._data;
00321 
00323         __asm
00324         {
00325                 mov eax, data2Ptr;
00326                 mov edx, output;
00327                 movd xmm0, scale;
00328                 shufps xmm0, xmm0, 0x00;
00329                 movaps xmm1, [ eax ];
00330                 mulps xmm0, xmm1;
00331                 movaps [ edx ], xmm0;
00332         }
00333         return d;
00334 #else
00335         return MVec2( v._data[ 0 ] * scale, v._data[ 1 ] * scale );
00336 #endif
00337 }
